H0.text: Neptune is the eighth planet from our sun.

H1.text: Earth is the eighth planet from our sun.

H2.text: Mars is the eighth planet from our sun.

H3.text: Uranus is the eighth planet from our sun.

A4.text: Neptune is the eighth and farthest known planet orbiting the Sun.

A5.text: From its discovery in 1846 until the discovery of Pluto in 1930, Neptune was the farthest known planet.
